name: inaccuracy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
C1 a situation in which a fact or measurement is not completely correct or exact: The film is full of historical inaccuracies. The inaccuracy of the missiles greatly diminishes their effectiveness. Opposites
accuracy
truth
